mission_vision_values.mission: Helping humans thrive in the age of AI by building human-centered approaches to AI adoption through social learning, critical thinking, and community
mission_vision_values.vision: Co-creating more relevant, practical, and social learning experiences in the age of AI
mission_vision_values.core_philosophy: Traditional learning can't keep up with the pace of change, especially in an AI-driven world. Implementation isn't adoption - AI shines in demos but stalls in workflows when people aren't brought along.
mission_vision_values.value_proposition: Unlock the missing 70% of AI ROI by focusing on what really drives transformation: mindset, literacy, trust, and leadership
mission_vision_values.tagline_extended: Build a human-first AI strategy bold enough to turn pilots into profit and fear into confidence
mission_vision_values.rebellion_against: The 'course factory' - passive, disconnected learning that doesn't drive real adoption or performance

services_products.overview: Consulting practice helping founders, teams, and learning leaders build learning cultures from scratch or reimagine existing ones to become more practical, energizing, and rooted in human connection

services.name: Assess
services.description: Evaluate current AI readiness and learning culture
services.focus: Understanding gaps in mindset, literacy, trust, and leadership

services.name: Align
services.description: Strategic alignment of AI initiatives with organizational culture

services.name: Accelerate
services.description: Implementation of social learning programs that drive AI adoption

services.name: Advise
services.description: Ongoing advisory and support for sustainable transformation

specific_offerings.name: Mentorship Blueprint
specific_offerings.description: Structured and repeatable mentorship program customized to client needs
specific_offerings.benefits: Clear framework to seamlessly onboard mentors and mentees, facilitate meaningful relationships, and measure success
specific_offerings.target_outcome: Set up an effective mentorship structure that lasts - simple, measurable, and impactful

specific_offerings.name: Learning Culture Blueprint
specific_offerings.description: Clear pathway to building a thriving environment of continuous learning
specific_offerings.approach: Partner with clients to assess current state, identify strengths and gaps, and co-create a strategic blueprint
specific_offerings.target_outcome: Unlock organizations' full potential by building a thriving learning culture that drives growth, innovation, and lasting impact

specific_offerings.name: Social Learning Design
specific_offerings.description: Design social learning experiences that turn passive content into an active community
specific_offerings.approach: Build a culture where learning is relevant, knowledge is shared, performance grows, and people stay
specific_offerings.differentiator: Transform disengaged communities into energizing spaces where people show up, contribute, and connect

specific_offerings.name: Community Blueprint
specific_offerings.description: Clear, practical roadmap to create or revive communities
specific_offerings.deliverables: Clarify community purpose, design meaningful interactions, foster ongoing engagement
specific_offerings.target_outcome: Transform disengaged communities into energizing spaces

ideal_client_profile.company_size: Scale-ups to enterprise (based on Meta/Uber experience)
pain_points: AI pilots that don't scale beyond demos
Low adoption rates despite technology investment
Learning programs that feel like checkboxes rather than catalysts
Missing 70% of AI ROI due to people/culture gaps
ideal_client_profile.readiness_indicators: Teams ready to ditch the status quo
ideal_client_profile.mindset: Organizations that understand implementation isn't adoption

psychographics.values: Human connection, practical learning, social impact, innovation
psychographics.concerns: AI transformation stalling, fear of AI displacement, lack of trust in new technology
psychographics.desires: Turn pilots into profit, transform fear into confidence, retain talent, drive real performance

unique_value_propositions: Human-first approach to AI adoption (not technology-first)
Focus on the missing 70% of AI ROI through people/culture transformation
Social learning over passive course content
Proven experience at Meta and Uber with programs serving 50,000+ people
Rebel positioning against traditional 'course factory' L&D
Integration of AI adoption with learning culture development
competitive_advantages: 8+ years building global, cohort-based learning at big tech (Meta, Uber, Randstad)
Ability to navigate strategic high-level and tactical detailed views
Proven track record building large-scale, global talent acquisition L&D projects
Community building expertise combined with AI adoption focus
First-hand experience with 50,000+ person mentorship programs

service_approach.methodology: Co-created strategy that transforms how teams learn, mentor, and connect
service_approach.philosophy: Reimagine learning not as a checkbox, but as a catalyst for clarity, connection, performance and change
service_approach.transparency: Raw, no-nonsense journey sharing as a first-time founder

newsletter.focus: Human-centered AI adoption, social learning, critical thinking, community, founder journey

client_testimonials.relationship: Worked together at Meta and Uber
client_testimonials.testimonial: I've had the pleasure of working with Klara over the years at Meta and Uber, and I'm continually inspired by her ability to create scalable, impactful programs that feel personalized and thoughtfully designed. Most recently, I supported her in developing a mentorship program from scratch, and her fierce kindness, innovative spirit, and genuine listening skills made the process both enjoyable and meaningful. Klara's straightforward, strategic approach and her deep care for her work make her a trusted partner.

Beyond her expertise, Klara's kindness and razor-sharp wit make every collaboration a burst of energy and insight. She is not only an expert in her field but also a trusted partner who is genuinely invested in the success of those she works with.

What truly sets Klara apart is her remarkable versatility. With experience at industry leaders like Meta, Uber, and Randstad, she seamlessly navigates between a strategic, high-level perspective and a detailed, tactical view, ensuring that both immediate needs and long-term objectives are met. Whether building large-scale, global talent acquisition L&D projects or solving pressing, tactical issues, Klara consistently delivers outstanding results.

content_themes: The Rise of Communities, Fellowships & Social Learning

key_messages: AI shines in demos but stalls in workflows when people aren't brought along
Mindset before model - AI readiness is a people-first endeavor
Shared human experiences are increasingly important amid AI advancement
Learning should be a catalyst, not a checkbox
Turn pilots into profit, fear into confidence

pricing_business_model.ideal_engagement: Organizations ready for transformation, not quick fixes

market_positioning.category: Human-First AI Adoption Consulting / Learning Culture Transformation
market_positioning.positioning_statement: The only learning consultancy that helps tech leaders unlock the missing 70% of AI ROI by transforming mindset, literacy, trust, and leadership - not just implementing technology
market_positioning.market_gap_addressed: Organizations struggle with AI adoption beyond pilots because they focus on technology implementation without addressing the human/cultural transformation needed for real adoption

competitive_landscape.traditional_competitors: L&D consultancies, AI implementation firms, change management consultancies
competitive_landscape.differentiation: Rebel positioning against 'course factory' L&D, focus on social learning vs passive content, proven big tech experience, AI adoption integrated with learning culture

speaking_engagements.topic: Staying human, curious, and connected in an AI-powered world
